name: @ps/nlp
description: database, API, business logic, and algorithms for wordio.co and besta.domains

scripts.tsc: bash _bash/_start_tsc.sh && echo 'develop using Typescript (run node once)'
scripts.dev: bash _bash/_start_dev.sh && echo 'this starts the server, and restarts on code change'
scripts.mac: bash _bash/_start_mac.sh && echo 'this is for development on APPLE MAC OS ONLY'
scripts.pro: bash _bash/_start_pro.sh && echo 'this is a quick start, for staging production'
scripts.deploy: bash _bash/_deploy.sh && echo 'this is the startup process, for production'
